meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Lathraea, parasitic on the roots of other plants.
meanings.sent1: The toothwort attached itself to the roots of the nearby tree.
meanings.sent2: The toothwort plant had delicate white flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The toothwort thought it was clever to steal nutrients from its host plant.
meanings.sent4: The toothwort's parasitic nature reminded me of a sneaky thief in the night.
meanings.sent5: The toothwort's dependence on other plants was like a silent partnership in the forest.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Dentaria, having toothed leaves and white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The toothwort with pink flowers stood out among the green foliage.
meanings.sent2: I found a toothwort plant with jagged leaves in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The toothwort plant seemed to be smiling with its toothed leaves.
meanings.sent4: The toothwort's toothed leaves were like tiny saw blades in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The toothwort's white flowers were a delicate touch in the wild landscape.
